files.package.json:
{
  "name": "js-tokens",
  "version": "4.0.0",
  "author": "Simon Lydell",
  "license": "MIT",
  "description": "A regex that tokenizes JavaScript.",
  "keywords": [
    "JavaScript",
    "js",
    "token",
    "tokenize",
    "regex"
  ],
  "files": [
    "index.js"
  ],
  "repository": "lydell/js-tokens",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "mocha --ui tdd",
    "esprima-compare": "node esprima-compare ./index.js everything.js/es5.js",
    "build": "node generate-index.js",
    "dev": "npm run build && npm test"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "coffeescript": "2.1.1",
    "esprima": "4.0.0",
    "everything.js": "1.0.3",
    "mocha": "5.0.0"
  }
}
